name: Circuito de la Comunidad Valenciana Ricardo Tormo
description: Is a motorsport race track located in Cheste (Valencia, Spain) and built in 1999. It has a capacity of 120,000 and a main straight of 876 metres. It is often used as a test track by the Formula One teams, because of the mild temperatures in winter.
tags: Circuito de la Comunidad Valenciana Ricardo Tormo
author: DA-DIGGA from simracingteam, Authorized conversion by Ema
